concept.title: Stack
concept.shortdesc: This site is built using the latest DITA Open Toolkit and the DITA 2.0 markup language in an automated pipeline that genrates and moves assets to a decentralized network.

conbody.p: Standard OASIS DITA 2.0 maps and topics are used for content development and defining navigation. Github Actions orchestrate the build processes. The latest stable version of the DITA Open Toolkit is auto-deployed and generates generic HTML5, Python is used to add additional configurations including responsive Bulma CSS. Hosting is provided by Fleek, URI availability is served up through Fleek's gateway and the resulting content is store and pinned on IPFS.
